images.title: EUV 확률적 결함 SEM 이미지 (Micro-Bridge / Line Break)
images.description: EUV 공정에서 발생하는 대표적 확률적 결함의 SEM 이미지. Micro-Bridge(인접 라인 사이 비정상 연결), Line Break(라인 중간 끊김), Missing Contact(홀 미오픈)의 3종.

spec.prompt: A set of three CD-SEM images showing typical EUV stochastic defects in semiconductor manufacturing. Left image 'Micro-Bridge': shows parallel line-space patterns where a thin bridge of resist connects two adjacent lines that should be separated, appearing as a bright spot bridging the dark space. Center image 'Line Break': shows a line pattern with a gap/break in the middle where the resist line is discontinuous, appearing as a dark interruption in a bright line. Right image 'Missing Contact': shows an array of contact hole patterns where one hole failed to open completely, appearing as a filled/partially-filled circle among open circles. All images have typical SEM grainy appearance with bright edge contrast, approximately 100,000x magnification. Labels and arrows indicate each defect type. The random/unpredictable locations of these defects should be evident.

images.description: 연도별 전 세계 EUV 스캐너 누적 설치 대수. TSMC/삼성/인텔 등 주요 고객별 구분. 2019년 양산 시작부터 2025년까지.

images.title: High-NA EUV: Anamorphic 4:1 × 8:1 축소 개념도
images.description: High-NA EUV에서 수평(4:1)과 수직(8:1) 축소비가 다른 아나모픽 광학계 개념. 결과적으로 노광 필드가 26×33mm에서 26×16.5mm로 절반 축소. 큰 칩은 Stitching 필요.

spec.prompt: A technical diagram explaining the anamorphic optics in High-NA EUV lithography. The diagram shows two panels side by side. Left panel 'Current EUV (NA=0.33)': mask pattern being reduced 4:1 in both X and Y directions through symmetric optics, resulting in a full 26×33mm exposure field on the wafer. Right panel 'High-NA EUV (NA=0.55)': mask pattern being reduced 4:1 in X direction but 8:1 in Y direction through anamorphic (asymmetric) optics, resulting in a half-height 26×16.5mm exposure field. Below, a wafer diagram shows how a large chip die that previously fit in one exposure now requires two exposures stitched together (labeled 'Stitching'), with the stitch boundary highlighted and labeled 'Stitch Overlay: new challenge'. Key numbers: NA improvement 0.33→0.55, Resolution improvement ~1.7×, DOF reduction ~3×. Clean technical illustration.
